Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

Test Steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.
Confirm the transaction and wait for it to complete.
Close the test dapp and switch back to the wallet.

Expected Result: The transaction status, recipient's address, nonce, amount, gas and total are shown in the item details.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.
Notes: Take a note of the Contract address.

Test Steps: Close the block explorer and switch back to the wallet.
Proceed to the Import tokens flow.
Confirm the addition of the custom token.
Expected Result:
The asset page is shown.
The specified token symbol is shown.
The specified token icon is shown.
The specified token balance is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to view the asset in the block explorer.
Expected Result: The block explorer opens in a new tab.

Test Steps: Close the block explorer and switch back to the wallet.
Proceed to view the token details.
Expected Result:
The token details page is shown.
The token balance is shown.
The token contract symbol is shown.
The token decimals is shown.
The current network is shown.

Test Steps: Navigate to the overview page using the asset breadcrumbs.
Expected Result:
The overview page is shown.
The TST token is shown in the wallets token list.
